name: Matryoshka Dungeon
description:
full screen recommended, if you have performance problems with the browser version please download binary executables below

My submission to Khartoum game jam 2020

An extremely difficult puzzle game where you use light, shadow and Matryoshka dolls

to escape the dungeon

if you're stuck watch the solution here https://youtu.be/arhv9Nnzn5U
